text: logo! ek misaal bayaan ki ja rahi hai, zara kaan laga kar sun lo, Allah ke siva jin jin ko tum pukaarte rahe ho, wo ek makkhi bhi to paida nahi kar sakte, go saare ke saare jama ho jaaye, balke agar makkhi un se koyi cheez le bhaage to, ye to ose bhi us se cheen nahi sakte, bada bodha hai talab karne waala aur bada bodha hai wo, jis se talab kiya jaa raha hai
